Improve everyone's engagement and happiness

Not getting feedback is one of the major reasons that leads to disengagement.
Teambit makes sharing feedback easy and fast...

Know the pulse of your company

Companies track tons of different metrics, but none is so influential on all others as the people on the team. Teambit allows you understand your team much better.

Always be sure what to do

We now there are hundreds of things on your mind, that's why Teambit will notify you at the perfect timing to do certain activities for boosting team's engagement.

Teambit is free to use with unlimited number of people
